amendatorysection.catchline: Supervision and control; powers of Department of Banking and Finance.
amendatorysection.para: The Department of Banking and Finance shall have power to issue permits to and shall have general supervision and control of all building and loan associations as defined in sections 8-301 to 8-340.01.

source.para: Laws 1919, c. 190, tit. V, art. XIX, § 1, p. 723;

annotation.para: Supervision and control extends to branches. First Fed. Sav. & Loan Assn. v. Department of Banking, 187 Neb. 562, 192 N.W.2d 736 (1971).
